page.title: 07LEISURE FACILITIES IN GROVE
page.content: THE FE WING TAKES A LOT OF CLASSES EG LANGUAGES SUCH AS FRENCH. IT SUPPLIES LEISURE FOR TEENAGERS AND YOUNGER PEOPLE,AS WELL AS GROWN-UPS.IT HAS LOTS OF EQUIPMENT EG:SNOOKER TABLES.THE VILLAGE HALL HOLDS LOTS OF CLUBS SUCH AS GUIDES AND BROWNIES.PARISH CHURCH HALL TAKES BROWNIES AND GUIDES AND SCRAMBLERS FOR TODDLERS.FAIRS ARE VERY POPULAR, ONCE A YEAR THEY COME TO US. THE METHODIST CHURCH HALL HAS THE GLORY GANG AND TAKES BALLET CLASSES. GROVE C.OF.E. HOLDS FETES AND OCCASIONALLY OTHER EVENTS.THERE ARE ALSO OPEN DAYS AT LOCAL FIRMS.HARVEST FESTIVALS ARE HELD IN INFANT SCHOOLS, AND CHURCHES.THE CHRISTMAS PARTIES ARE FUN FOR THE CHILDREN AND ARE HELD IN MOST SCHOOLS AND CHURCHES.
